page.title: 12Local News-Gloucester
page.content: This is a brief part of Gloucester news.It is mostly about the area or people.Two to three months ago we had the{county elections.}People said that Conservative control would be ended in some counties.Glostershire was no exception.For the first time in 100_years the Conservatives did not have the majority.The Liberal Alliance with backing from Labour took control of the County Council. On the 19th June a policeman had to jump out of the path of a car driven by two{burglars}discovered at Gloucester Old Boys Rugby Club.The car was abandoned in Horton Road. {Wotton Brook}on the edge of Plock Court Playing Fields has been{polluted by black oil.The ducks have gone and the water's filthy.The source is a firm on Eastern Avenue.
